{{About|cards in Genius Invokation TCG|official images used to introduce a new playable character|Character Introduction/Gallery#Character Cards}}
'''Character Cards''' are a [[Card Type]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]]. They are the main attacking force and 3 character cards must be included in the player's deck.

==How to Obtain==
* Character Cards based on [[Playable Characters]] can be obtained by achieving victory in the [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage#Friendly Fracas 2|Friendly Fracas]] difficulty of [[Genius Invokation TCG/Invitational|Invitationals]].
** [[Diluc (Character Card)|Diluc]], [[Kaeya (Character Card)|Kaeya]], [[Sucrose (Character Card)|Sucrose]] and [[Fischl (Character Card)|Fischl]] are obtained during the tutorial quest [[Come Try Genius Invokation TCG!]].
* Character Cards based on certain [[Enemies]] can be obtained by achieving victory on the Friendly Fracas difficulty of [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage#Friendly Fracas|Tavern Challenges]].

==Skills==
* Character Cards have three types of skills that can be used: [[Character Card Normal Attack|Normal Attack]], [[Character Card Elemental Skill|Elemental Skill]] and [[Character Card Elemental Burst|Elemental Burst]].
** Some cards may have multiple Normal Attacks or Elemental Skills.
** Some cards may have [[Character Card Passive Skill|Passive Skill]]s.

==Character Card Proficiency==
===Rules===
Raise Proficiency with Character Cards by engaging in more duels and obtain the corresponding rewards.<br/>
Only the use of {{Color|help|player-created decks}} in duels will increase Proficiency.<br/>
Use the invitation board to {{Color|help|invite characters and participate in Co-Op Mode duels}}. {{Color|help|After each victory in such duels}}, all characters within the deck that was used will gain 1 point of Proficiency.<br/>
For other duel types, the player will only gain Proficiency for Character Cards in the deck used the {{Color|help|first time victory is achieved}}.<br/>

===Proficiency Rewards===
When any Character Card reaches Proficiency 10, the player can obtain {{Color|help|Dynamic Skins}} for their {{Color|help|Talent Card}}.
